exitValidatorModal.modalMessage:
Та СОНГОГДСОН валидатор ТҮЛХҮҮРҮҮД-ийг гинжнээс гаргахдаа итгэлтэй байна уу?
Энэ нь таны валидаторын ажилгааг зогсоох ба энэ үйлдлийг БУЦААХ БОЛОМЖГҮЙ. Зөвхөн сүлжээ зөвшөөрсөн тохиолдолд л та өөрийн хөрөнгө оруулалтыг татан авах боломжтой.
exitValidatorModal.exitApprove: БИ ТЕКСТИЙГ УНШСАН БӨГӨӨД ҮР ДАГАВАРЫГ МЭДЭГДЭЖ БАЙНА

customInstallation.customInstallationText: This mode is meant for more advanced users and requires you to have an understanding of how the clients interact with each other. You will have to pick and choose, install and connect every part of your node with the UI yourself before it will be functional!

prunningModal.prunningText: GETH used up storage space GROWs over its operational time. It takes MULTIPLE HOURS to prune the Geth database, removing unnecessary data and freeing up some of the used storage space. This has to be done while Geth is not running. STARTING THE PRUNING PROCESS YOUR NODE WILL GO OFFLINE AND STOP POTENTIAL ATTESTATION DUTIES.
prunningModal.prunningChecked: I READ THE TEXT AND I AM AWARE OF THE CONSEQUENCES
prunningModal.close: хаахын тулд гадна талд товшино уу

rpcGuide.clickNav: Click on “CONTROL” to enter the Control Panel.
rpcGuide.toggleMessage: Click on the “ON/OFF” button to open your port
rpcGuide.clickExtention: Click on “your Execution Client” button to copy the RPC URL
rpcGuide.clickCancel: Цуцлахын тулд x дээр дарна уу
rpcGuide.firstMessage: RPC-Endpoint widget located in dashboard. Please turn “ON” the button and click “Execution Client” to proceed to the next step.
rpcGuide.secondMessage: You can now send your transaction OVER YOUR NODE WITH METAMASK. When you are done sending your transactions, click on “ON” to close your port
rpcGuide.firstSlide: Now login to your dAPP or wallet you want to use (in our case MetaMask)
rpcGuide.fourthSlide: Type in a name for your network
rpcGuide.fivethSlide: Paste in the copied URL from Stereum
rpcGuide.sixthSlide: Type in the CHAIN-ID your node runs on(for GoerliTestnet it is 5)
rpcGuide.seventhSlide: Type in “ETH” as the currency symbol
rpcGuide.eightthSlide: OPTIONAL - you can paste in a Block Explorer URL

resyncModal.message: YOUR CLIENT Stores blockchain data ON YOUR SERVER SO YOUR NODE CAN serve the network. this is necessary for your node TO PICK up its ATTESTATION DUTY in STAKING. BY USING THIS OPTION YOU ARE DELETING YOUR CLIENTS's CURRENT BLOCKCHAIN DATA & USE THE SELECTED OPTION AS A SOURCE TO SYNCHRONIZE YOUR NODE ANEW.
resyncModal.syncMsg: SYNCS YOUR CLIENT FROM THE BEGINNING OF THE CHAIN

fastSync.header: Set how the Node clients will synchronize their blockchain data.
fastSync.message: After installing your node, your clients will start syncing with the synchronization source you selected. This process can take multiple hours or days. Typically, the Consensus Client syncs first, followed by the Execution Client.
